name: WizardingWorldBookQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open wizarding world quiz”
”Alexa, start wizarding world quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wizarding world quiz
Developer Terms of Use
des: Dive headfirst into the wondrous world of Harry Potter and Fantastic Beasts with this interactive audiobook game. Simply say ‘Alexa, open Wizarding World Quiz’ to begin your exploration of the magical universe. With three brand new questions every day for up to four players, you’ll discover what it means to be magical, from learning about spells and potions to tales from the very pages of the Wizarding World books. The first seven days are available for free, with the premium version available through a Kids+ subscription. With the premium version, you can come back every day for your chance to answer bonus questions, earn special badges, and enjoy themed content on special events, including character birthdays and important dates from the books like Back to Hogwarts!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
